metadata.synopsis: Trespass dialog for approaching the Murder Tribunal without becoming an Unholy Assassin. Sarevok will warn you.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to the Murder Tribunal (goto -1255 1 503) (near S_LOW_MurderTribunal_Court_WarningSpot_Box_e543dbbf-aca6-4214-80df-db8de06fbe72)- Enter the trespass trigger near the members of the tribunal: see the GUID above.
